pkgmetadata.longdescription: Synchrosqueezed Wavelet Transform // The synchrosqueezed wavelet transform is implemented. The package is a translation of MATLAB Synchrosqueezing Toolbox, version 1.1 originally developed by Eugene Brevdo (2012). The C code for curve_ext was authored by Jianfeng Lu, and translated to Fortran by Dongik Jang. Synchrosqueezing is based on the papers: [1] Daubechies, I., Lu, J. and Wu, H. T. (2011) Synchrosqueezed wavelet transforms: An empirical mode decomposition-like tool. Applied and Computational Harmonic Analysis, 30. 243-261. [2] Thakur, G., Brevdo, E., Fukar, N. S. and Wu, H-T. (2013) The Synchrosqueezing algorithm for time-varying spectral analysis: Robustness properties and new paleoclimate applications. Signal Processing, 93, 1079-1094.
